page.title: 02A Day In the Life of Michael
page.content: When I got up I went to wash and then I went to dress.After that I went down stairs and I had my breakfast, then I got ready for school.Then I got on my bike and went to school.When I got there we played football on the play ground.Then the bell rang and we had to go in and Mr Cotton called the register and I took my dinner money to him.Then we had assembly.After that we did more work and then it was dinner. We played football for half an hour.After we had dinner,we did some work on shapes but mine went wrong. After that I did some maths and then it was afternoon break.After that they did P.E. but I did not because I got told off for talking.When it was home time I rode home.I went to my green house and watered my beans. I had my tea ,I watched tv and went to bed at nine o'clock. {
